title: Gym Junkie
description: We’ve all done it, salivated over a guy at the gym, imagined the unimaginable. Wanted what we can’t have.  Only my fantasy has turned into an obsession. Every night like clockwork he’s there. Every night like clockwork I’m ready.  I’m not the kind of girl who does this sort of thing and he’s exactly the kind of man that does.  He’s as sexy AF. Dominant as all hell. Built like a machine.  And when he turns up at my work My absolute worst nightmare.
author: T.L. Swan
